name: Haunted Kitchen
description:
Defend the kitchen from the Ghosties!

Hordes of Ghosties are coming in waves. Protect the pantry and its precious snacks at all costs!

Control Appliances with Dark Magic and fight back!

Strike back with the Oven, Fridge, and Dishwasher, each with their own unique active and passive attacks.

Dynamic Demonics

The better you do, the harder it gets. If the Pantry takes damage, things will slow back down. Pick up items to help battle against the Ghosties.

How to Fight the Ghosties

Switch between the three auto-firing appliances: Oven, Fridge, and Dishwasher. When one appliance is active, the two others are passive, and use their unique attacks that can be helpful in all kinds of situations.

Building Defenses

Use your Metal to build turrets. Look for the blue wrench bar at the bottom right of the screen to see how much you have. When its blue, you have at least 50 metal to build a turret. Over time you get more automatically and also get 25 per round you beat.
